#include "mayacommands/beastcreatetexturecmd.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beasttexturewrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastlightwrapper.h"

#include <maya/MSyntax.h>
#include <maya/MArgParser.h>
#include <maya/MStringArray.h>
#include <maya/MDagPath.h>

#include "mayautils.h"
#include "liveasyncjob.h"
#include "plugincontext.h"

namespace beastmaya {

namespace {
        int getMaxShaderSamplingResolution() {
                int maxShaderSamplingResolution = 256;
                MObject settingsNode = findMayaNode(L"beastSettings");
                if (settingsNode != MObject::kNullObj) {
                        getPlugValue(settingsNode, L"maxShaderSamplingResolution", maxShaderSamplingResolution);
                }
                return maxShaderSamplingResolution;
        }

        bool hasSuffix(const std::wstring& str, const std::wstring& suffix) {
                return suffix.length() <= str.length() && str.substr(str.length() - suffix.length()) == suffix;
        }

        std::wstring removeSuffix(const std::wstring& str, const std::wstring& suffix) {
                return hasSuffix(str, suffix) ? str.substr(0, str.length() - suffix.length()) : str;
        }
}
        
MSyntax BeastCreateTextureCmd::newSyntax() {
        MSyntax syntax;

        syntax.setObjectType(MSyntax::kStringObjects);

        // Make command non-queryable and non-editable:
        syntax.enableQuery(false);
        syntax.enableEdit(false);

        return syntax;
}

MStatus BeastCreateTextureCmd::doIt( const MArgList& args ) {
        MStatus res;
        MArgParser parser(syntax(), args, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        MStringArray argsStrings;
        res = parser.getObjects(argsStrings);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        if (argsStrings.length() < 3) {
                return MStatus::kFailure;
        }

        MObject mayaObject = findMayaNode(argsStrings[0].asWChar());
        MFnDependencyNode dependencyNode(mayaObject, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        LiveAsyncJobPtr job = LiveAsyncJob::getInstance();
        if (!job) {
                return MStatus::kFailure;
        }

        JobContext& bjc = job->getJobContext();

        std::wstring plugName = argsStrings[1].asWChar();
        std::pair<MObject, std::wstring> connection = getConnectedNode(dependencyNode, plugName);
        if (connection.first == MObject::kNullObj) {
                return MStatus::kFailure;
        }
        int maxShaderSamplingResolution = getMaxShaderSamplingResolution();
        ResourceManager& rm = bjc.getPluginContext().getResourceManager();
        BeastTexturePtr beastTexture = rm.createTexture(connection.first, connection.second, maxShaderSamplingResolution, maxShaderSamplingResolution);

        BeastMaterialPtr beastMaterial = bjc.getSceneManager().getMaterial(mayaObject);
        if (beastMaterial.get() != NULL) {
                std::wstring paramName = removeSuffix(plugName, L"Texture");
                beastMaterial->setShaderParamTexture(paramName.c_str(), *beastTexture);
                return MStatus::kSuccess;
        }

        // So it's not a material, can it be a dag node perhaps.
        if (mayaObject.hasFn(MFn::kDagNode)) {
                MFnDagNode dagNode(mayaObject, &res);
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
                
                MDagPath path;
                dagNode.getPath(path);

                MObject transformNode = path.transform(&res);
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

                // Check if we have a light source
                BeastLightPtr beastLight = bjc.getSceneManager().getLight(transformNode);
                if(beastLight.get() != NULL) {
                        if(mayaObject.hasFn(MFn::kVolumeLight)) {
                                beastLight->setSkylightTexture(*beastTexture);
                        }
                        // Set color to white because we want only the texture to influence appearance
                        beastLight->setColor(ILBLinearRGB(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f));
                        return MStatus::kSuccess;
                }
        }
        MGlobal::displayError(L"BEAST: Unsupported object in beastCreateTexture command.");
        return MStatus::kFailure;
}

void * BeastCreateTextureCmd::creator() { 
        return new BeastCreateTextureCmd(); 
}

}
